title: Viewpoint on Sydney
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray and Arch Nicholson
brief_description: The city of Sydney, New South Wales, as seen through the eyes of European migrants. It is seen as a big exciting city with many contrasts. Job opportunities are discussed as well as other advantages and disadvantages of living in Sydney.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Don Murray and Arch Nicholson
